transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan sir, woh jo puch rahe the na buyleads ke leke. Theek hai na? Toh abhi aapko na 14 buyleads hai na aur har week mein extra milega aapko.
Customer: Woh milega lekin main bol raha hu kuch free buyleads nahi milega?
Executive: Aaa aapko kabhi agar kam agar padega na kisi bhi tab mujhe bataiyega toh main 20 buyleads aur extra main aapko dilwa dunga.
Customer: Aap kuch karo na.
Executive: Haan, kya hua?
Customer: Kuch dekho na hota hai toh buyleads.
Executive: Theek hai, main aapko 20 aur 20 dilwa dunga lekin one time dilwaunga main aapko. Woh 4000 ke aas pass hota hai 20 buyleads ki kimat. Lekin aaj hi aap payment process kara dete toh 20 buyleads main additional aapko dilwa dunga, theek hai?
Customer: Kya, kya bol rahe hai?
Executive: 20 buylead jo hai iske alawa one time mane ek baar main aapko dilwa dunga aaj aap payment process kara dijiye.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Aur aap aapka aapne jo customer care pe call kiya tha na toh mere pass na woh request open ho gaya toh main isko na close kar deta hu, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aapne isiliye call kiya tha na woh preferred star ki service ke leke?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai na? Baki main aapko na 20 aap iska payment kara dete toh 20 additional buyleads aapko mil jayega, theek hai? Haan boliye.
Customer: Hello, hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Main bol raha hu do campaign PPF star lene se uska price kitna hai?
Executive: Kya hua? Do?
Customer: Do category preferred star lene se.
Executive: Do category preferred, jo abhi chal raha hai uske alawa do category lena chahte ho?
Customer: Nahi abhi haan preferred star abhi le rahe karte toh ek category le lijiye woh preferred star. Usme kitna hai?
Executive: Toh do IMS star chalega aur do preferred star chalega, yeh kar rahe ho na aap?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Char chalega na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh char chalega toh abhi jo maine aapko diya hai na jo amount diya hai na inka theek double aapko pay karna padega.
Customer: Kitna?
Executive: Nahi rukiye main bata deta hu, exact bata deta hu kitna padega aapko. Ruk jaiye ek minute.
[silence]
Executive: 1,73,452
Executive: 1,73,452
Executive: Minus 13311
Executive: Full payment kijiyega?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Full payment kijiyega toh woh karega aapka 1,72,766.
Customer: Usme cashback aayega na?
Executive: Aap cashback aa dekho yaha pe nahi jaise ki abhi agar aapne jo payment kiya hai abhi jo bhi jab woh maine proposal bheja hai usme bhi cashback maine use kiya hai. Agar aap do category loge toh do category mein jo cashback bachega woh ek hi time pe use hoga na? Bar bar toh use nahi hoga na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh woh aap do category lijiyega toh woh waha pe wohi main adjust karke toh woh aapko 1,72,766 ka aa raha hai.
Customer: Hmm, samajh mein nahi aa raha hai aap kya bol rahe hai dobara boliye.
Executive: Jaise ki aapko ek category ka toh maine bhej diya usme bhi aapne cashback use kiya hai, theek hai na? Agar aap ek category ki jagah pe do category lete hai toh do category lijiyega toh waha pe bhi aapka jo amount aayega usi mein se hi hum 13,452 hi adjust kar payenge na? Wohi toh minus kar payenge.
Customer: Haan woh minus kar rahe hai lekin main jo 1,72,000 pay karega uska toh bhi cashback aayega.
Executive: Haan bilkul, haan bilkul ab isse bhi hamara cashback generate ho jayega.
Customer: Usme kitna aayega cashback?
Executive: Woh cashback aayega hamara 17,276 ka.
Customer: Theek hai main baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan baat karke bataiye, theek hai na? Jaisa bhi hoga waise karte hai. Baki main aapka yeh jo request aaya tha na baat karne ke liye customer care se usko close kar deta hu aap feedback de dijiyega. Theek hai? Koi bhi dikkat ho aap mujhe call kar lijiyega. Whatsapp number de diya personal number aap mujhe call kar lijiyega, theek hai? Kyunki aapka aur Satrushi dono ka account mere paas hi hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Chaliye, okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about free buyleads.

- Wants to know price for two PPF star campaigns.

- Wants cashback details for the new plan.



Resolution:

- Offered 20 extra buyleads on payment processing.

- Explained the pricing for two PPF star campaigns.

- Explained cashback adjustment for the new plan.

- Closed customer care request and asked for feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss and revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, cashback, payment, preferred star
